name: userstyles.org: iStyles
description:
userstyles.org redesigned for Mac: cleaner and easier to spot styles.

Best viewed with Firefox 3.5.

2009.07.07: FIXED optimization and small tweaks. [203]
2009.07.04: CHANGED for redesigned site. [175]
2009.07.01: CHANGED omit justified line for it is annoying in some cases. [158]
2009.06.22: CHANGED color for even list and small tweaks. [132]
2009.06.18: FIXED header logo & navigation positioning and small tweaks.  CHANGED name (formerly Mac OS X Lingo). [95]
2009.06.11: CHANGED prettier header, list dots, and small tweaks as well. [60]
2009.06.08: FIXED for Webkit browsers.
2009.06.05: Initial release.
